heading: Why choose Kivon
description: Kivon is a platform that allows you to buy and sell cryptocurrencies with ease. We are a team of experienced traders and developers who are dedicated to providing the best possible service to our users.

items.title: 24/7 live support
items.description: Our dedicated support team is around the corner to offer you personal support

items.title: Best market rates
items.description: We offer the best market rates for all your crypto needs

items.title: Secure and reliable
items.description: Your cryptocurrencies is not stored , they are instantly sent to your wallet after exchange occurs. - Try it now

items.title: Fast transactions
items.description: With an average exchange time of 2 mins, this helps you take advantage of market opportunities
